name: Mobile Rescue Squad: Flood Shelter Army Mission
name_original: Mobile Rescue Squad: Flood Shelter Army Mission
description:
The city has been ravaged by a huge flood and rain storm, causing havoc throughout the city and putting hundreds of lives in lethal danger. Survivors are trying to gain higher ground looking for recue help, where you and your mobile rescue squad comes into play.

Your job as the flood shelter rescue commander is to track down survivor in tagged locations throughout the flood ridden city and send in your fleet of latest rescue boats to the mission. Reach all of the survivors in time, load the civilians and get them to safety and health services before any more casualties arrive. The faster you act, the more lives you save. Complete each timed level to the best time check you can to gain maximum army promotion points.


REAL KIDS LEARNING AND EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE

This boat driving and flood rescue simulator provides a great learning experience for kids about floods and how to survive during natural calamities. You can become an instant savior by learning simple tricks from the game to help out people in distress in many familiar situations.

FEATURES
Highly realistic boat driving simulation experience
Different levels spread throughout the city with time limits provide challenges in both driving and retrieving civilians in distress
Pick up and transport people to receive health care before any more casualties arise
Complete tough challenges in best possible time to receive more army promotion points
Gain the experience of surfing in water and performing national duty under one game
